SELECT t.id, t.utm_id, t.user_id, u.username AS user_name, DATE_FORMAT(t.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) AS register_time, FROM_UNIXTIME( t.invest_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S' ) AS first_invest_time, DATE_FORMAT(c.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) AS open_account_time, CASE ui.sex WHEN 1 THEN '男' WHEN 2 THEN '女' ELSE '未知' END AS sex, ui.truename AS true_name, u.mobile, utm.source_id, utm.utm_source AS source_name, utm.utm_term AS key_name,
(SELECT CASE WHEN SUM(tender.account) IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE SUM(tender.account) END account FROM hyjf_user.ht_utm_reg reg INNER JOIN hyjf_trade.ht_borrow_tender tender ON tender.user_id = reg.user_id INNER JOIN hyjf_trade.ht_borrow borrow ON borrow.borrow_nid = tender.borrow_nid AND borrow.project_type <> 8 WHERE reg.user_id = t.user_id ) AS cumulative_invest, (SELECT CASE WHEN SUM(hdpa.accede_account) IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE SUM(hdpa.accede_account) END account FROM hyjf_user.ht_utm_reg reg INNER JOIN hyjf_trade.ht_debt_plan_accede hdpa ON hdpa.user_id = reg.user_id WHERE reg.user_id = t.user_id ) AS htj_invest,
(SELECT CASE WHEN SUM(hct.assign_capital) IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE SUM(hct.assign_capital) END account FROM hyjf_user.ht_utm_reg reg INNER JOIN hyjf_trade.ht_credit_tender hct ON hct.user_id = reg.user_id WHERE reg.user_id = t.user_id ) AS hzr_invest, IFNULL(t.invest_amount,0) AS invest_amount, t.invest_project_type, t.invest_project_period FROM hyjf_user.ht_utm_reg t LEFT JOIN hyjf_user.ht_user_info ui ON t.user_id = ui.user_id LEFT JOIN hyjf_user.ht_user u ON t.user_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN hyjf_user.ht_utm utm ON t.utm_id = utm.utm_id LEFT JOIN hyjf_user.ht_account_chinapnr c ON t.user_id = c.user_id
ORDER BY t.id DESC
LIMIT #{limitStart} , #{limitEnd}

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM hyjf_user.ht_utm_reg t LEFT JOIN hyjf_user.ht_user_info ui ON t.user_id = ui.user_id LEFT JOIN hyjf_user.ht_user u ON t.user_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN hyjf_user.ht_utm utm ON t.utm_id = utm.utm_id LEFT JOIN hyjf_user.ht_account_chinapnr c ON t.user_id = c.user_id
